entry.dcterms:description: work, family, friendly relationships, free time activities, the significance of politics and religion; subjective satisfaction, political consciousness, the image of society; attitudes about work and current job, evaluation of workplace; membership in civil societies, associations, voluntary activities; trust in people, social groups, Bogardus scale; state of health, way of living; ideas about the meaning of life, the evaluation of scientific progress; opinions about ethical and moral pronciples, religious way of life and faith; marriage, divorce, abortion, different family types, evaluation of female employment; principles of child rearing; opinions about different types of political actions; trust in various civil and governmental organizations, institutions; membership in political parties, trade unions,political self-categorization
entry.dcterms:subject: science and technology
childbearing, family planning and abortion
community, urban and rural life
religion and values
demography
family life, marriage, relationship
health condition
social behaviour and attitudes
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
time-series

Adults aged 18 and over in the entire population of 45 countries around the world. Both national random and quota sampling were used. The populations of India, China, and Nigeria, as well as rural areas and the illiterate population were put into subsamples.
data collection with questionnaire
B
